heading: making the grade
subheading: the wired investment portfolio i’ve been managing the wip for exactly two years, and it’s report-card time. despite the handcuffing restriction of trading only once each month, the portfolio has generated total returns besting nearly all major indices. the numbers: the wip, 86.2 percent; the s&p 500, 59.8 percent; the dow, 48.0 percent; the russell […]
author: wired staff
